description: The data is from IIASA-VID Dataset (W Lutz, A Goujon, S K.C., W Sanderson. 2007. Reconstruction of population by age, sex and level of educational attainment of 120 countries for 1970-2000. Vienna Yearbook of Population Research, vol. 2007, pp 193-235.)
